text: nabee ka haq eemaanavaalon par svayan unake apane praanon se badhakar hai. aur usakee patniyon unakee maen hai. aur allaah ke vidhaan ke anusaar saamaany mominon aur muhaajiron kee apeksha naatedaar aapas mein ek-doosare se adhik nikat hai. yah aur baat hai ki tum apane saathiyon ke saath koee bhalaee karo. yah baat kitaab mein likhee huee hai
